description: Enjoy year - round dining on the glass - fronted terrace, which overlooks the garden and the beautiful lake. The cuisine here encompasses the whole of Italy, occasionally using ingredients from other countries and continents which combine well in its recipes. Attractive guestrooms, plus a refreshing swimming pool which is available for residents only.
